billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Requires the legislature to be sequestered if they do not timely pass a budget
summary: Provides that if the legislature does not timely pass a budget, it shall be sequestered until legislative passage of such budget; defines sequestered.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to requiring the legislature to be sequestered if the legislative passage of the budget is not timely
